title: Decadent chocolate mousse cake with meringue hearts
ingredients: ['For the meringue', '4 egg whites', '200g caster sugar', 'pinch salt', '1 or 2 drops red food colouring', 'For the cake', '4 eggs, separated', '100g caster sugar', '200g chestnut puree (homemade or tinned)', '30g butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '50g cornflour', '1 pinch baking soda', 'For the filling', '475ml whipping cream', '180g dark chocolate']
